forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 62. Southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfurls over Boston, the night gives way to a gentle transition, with a whisper of clouds lingering in the sky. The air holds a mild embrace, resting just above 60 degrees, while the streets begin to stir with the promise of a new day. As the sun makes its ascent, it will coax forth a delightful blend of partly sunny skies, with temperatures climbing toward the late afternoon, beckoning a respite from the gentle chill of the morning. The westward breeze, a friend to those who wander, will dance at 10 to 15 mph, each gust creating a playful chill that hints at the shifting seasons.

Dress in layers that respect both the coolness of early hours and the warmth of midday’s radiance. Perhaps a light jacket, easily shed, would complement a comfortable sweater, giving you the freedom to embrace the day without fuss. With such inviting weather, consider a leisurely stroll along the esplanade or a visit to one of Boston’s many intriguing bookstores. A warm cup of coffee in hand, you might meander through the spirited streets, exploring quaint corners and breathing in the crisp fall air, savoring the understated beauty of an unhurried November day.
